name: Scuba Surfer
description:
This is a 2D Platformer project created for MI 445 in Fall 2021. The game was created by Nicole Stocks. 

Modifications: 

1. Game's theme was changed with original artwork to reflect that including new background, new tilemap, and new foreground details. With the art changes, new SFX to represent the new theme were also implemented.

2. A new soundtrack was created including three original songs for the main menu, level one, and level two. 

3. Two new levels were created. 

4. The UI was minorly changed to make it cohesive with the theme change, as well as the original player, enemies, and goal pickup. 

Credits:

MSU's GEL Lab

freesound.org user Godowan for Bubble SFX
